## ExtractValueType type

From observableArray, an array of Observable of some value type, extract an array of this value type.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type ExtractValueType<observableArray extends ReadonlyArray<Observable<any>>> = {
    [contentName in keyof observableArray]: observableArray[contentName] extends Observable<infer contentNameType> ? contentNameType : never;
};
```
